inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Diagnostic laparoscopy revealed phlegmon with no other abdominal abnormalities.

inclusion.criterion: Stool in the abdomen at the time of appendectomy
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: CT scan showed evidence of acute perforated appendicitis with free fluid in the pelvis.

exclusion.criterion: Another condition affecting surgical decision making or recovery
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Severe migratory pain in the right lower quadrant of his abdomen, accompanied by nausea and vomiting. He is now a candidate for emergent laparoscopic appendectomy under general anesthesia.
